story.text: Steve Cline's home page can be found at: [http://www.objectbap.com/ www.objectbap.com].  His personal page is at [http://www.clines.org www.clines.org]

I was first exposed to Smalltalk in a course at [[North Carolina State University]] in 1987, using it sporadically until leaving IBM in 1994, and have been earning a living with it since then, in big shop/MIS situations.

I am interested in the use of Smalltalk in small shops, writing for shrink-wrap, shareware, or small business solutions. My primary dialects are [[Visual Works]], [[Visual Age]], VSE, and [[Pocket Smalltalk]].
I am currently an employee of [[First Data Corporation]].
